title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 15.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 15.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

The following words and phrases as used herein shall be
defined as follows: (a) Person. An
individual, partnership, corporation, joint-stock company, society, association, receiver, lessee, trustee, estate, referee, assignee, or any other
person acting in a fiduciary or representative capacity, whether appointed by a
court or otherwise, and any combination of individuals. (b) Motor vehicle. Any vehicle operated upon
a public highway or public street propelled by any power other than muscular
power. (c) Commercial motor
vehicle. Refers to those vehicles set forth in section
15.3
of this Part and having a mgw
of 10,000 pounds or less. (d) Use. Any use of a motor vehicle upon the public highways or streets of the
city. (e) Maximum gross weight. The
weight of the motor vehicle plus the weight of the maximum load to be carried, if any, by such vehicle. (f) Registrant. The person who registers a motor vehicle as owner thereof pursuant
to the registration requirements of the Vehicle and Traffic Law of the State of

New York. (g) Registration fee. The
full annual fee or charge prescribed in the Vehicle and Traffic Law of the

State of New York for the registration of a motor vehicle. (h) City. The City of New York. (i) Commissioner of finance. The commissioner
of finance of the city. (j) Tax
year. June 1st of any calendar year through May 31st of the following calendar
year. (k) Medallion taxi cab. A
motor vehicle used for the transportation of passengers which is duly licensed
as a taxicab by the taxi and limousine commission of the city and permitted to
accept hails from passengers in the street. (l) Commissioner of Motor Vehicles. The

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles of the State of New York. (m) DMV. The Department of Motor

Vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง
15.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
